articles.title: Donald Trump drops off Forbes’ 400 richest Americans - Daily Post Nigeria
articles.description: Former U.S. President, Donald Trump was not included in the annual Forbes 400 ranking of the wealthiest Americans. Forbes said Trump is now worth an estimated 2.5 billion dollars, leaving him 400 million dollars short of the cutoff to make this year’s 400 lis…
